item.description:
Trying to stay warm during the winter? Let's have a soup party! January's Raw Maine potluck will be all about the soups. Bring your favourite soup and/or soup accompaniment and let's share some ideas about how to stay comfy cozy during the Maine winter!

Please bring a raw vegan dish to share and come in comfy clothes. Additional guests are welcome! Fresh local spring water, iced and hot herbal tea, dishes, cutlery, etc. will be provided. If you need directions, call or email me.

Looking forward to seeing you there! xoxo

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Raw Maine January Potluck: Soup's On!
